dict.string: With a 3 km walk, an average person could burn around 170 calories, you are half of the average recommended walking distance
With a 5 km walk, an average person could burn around 300 calories, you are close to the average recommended walking distance
With a 7 km walk, an average person could burn around 420 calories, this is a good amount exercise for a soft training.
With a 10 km walk, an average person could burn around 600 calories, you have reached a great goal
With a 13 km walk, an average person could burn around 780 calories, great job, you are making an incredible goal
More than 17km is an incredible mark, rest a bit, take some food and keep going!
